description:
This course is about developing a sense of fulfilment in your life. It's perfect for those who need to break out of a fixed mindset that has left them feeling stuck, fixed in place and wanting more from life without necessarily knowing what more means. The course if broken down into 5 sections:

  1. Set a firm foundation
  2. Define and understand your desires
  3. Define and understand your values
  4. Acting in accordance with your values
  5. Understanding and refining your desires, values and actions

Through the video and complimentary PDF lectures your interest will be piqued as we deconstruct closed systems of thought, and explore the principles behind well refined open systems of thought. The exercises and task lists will get you to actively construct a growth mindset that will remain with you throughout life. Your sense of fulfilment in life is derived from this growth mindset, which seeks to continually learn, create, and refine the means by which you approach your desired ends.
title: The Cultivation of Fulfilment
